targets.sql: select last(first_ep) as first_ep from $database.cluster_info
select last(version) as version from $database.cluster_info
select last(master_uptime) from $database.cluster_info
select last(expire_time) from $database.grants_info
select max(timeseries_used) as used ,max(timeseries_total) as total from $database.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s)
select last(dbs_total) from $database.cluster_info
select last(tbs_total) from $database.cluster_info
select connections_total from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select dnodes_total as total, dnodes_alive as dnodes_alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select mnodes_total as total, mnodes_alive as mnodes_alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select vgroups_total as total, vgroups_alive as vgroups_alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select vnodes_total as total, vnodes_alive as vnodes_alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select _wstart as ts, avg(dnodes_alive)/avg(dnodes_total) from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(mnodes_alive)/avg(mnodes_total) from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(vgroups_alive)/avg(vgroups_total) from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(vnodes_alive)/avg(vnodes_total) from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(timeseries_used)/avg(timeseries_total) as percent from $database.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(timeseries_used) as used , avg(timeseries_total) as total from $database.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, last(expire_time) as expire_time from $database.grants_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select ts, derivative(errors, 1s, 1) as errors from (select _wstart as ts, sum(errors) as errors from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(1s))
select endpoint, status from information_schema.ins_dnodes
select last(uptime) from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to group by dnode_ep
select _wstart as ts, avg(dnodes_total) as total, avg(dnodes_alive) as dnodes_alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select mnode_ep, last(role) as role from $database.m_info partition by mnode_ep, cluster_id
select _wstart as ts, avg(mnodes_total) as total, avg(mnodes_alive) as mnodes_alive from $database.cluster_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, avg(req_insert_rate) as insert_rate, avg(req_insert_batch_rate) as batch_rate from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, avg(insert_rate) as cluster_insert_rate, avg(batch_rate) as cluster_batch_rate from (select _wstart as ts, sum(req_insert_rate) as insert_rate, sum(req_insert_batch_rate) as batch_rate from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(1s)) where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, sum(req_select) as req_select from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, sum(req_select) as total from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(req_select_rate) as dnode_req_select_rate from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to partition by dnode_ep interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, avg(req_select_rate) as req_select_rate from (select _wstart as ts, sum(req_select_rate) as req_select_rate from $database.dnodes_info where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval(1s)) where ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(stbs_total) from $database.cluster_info
select _wstart as ts, last(tbs_total) as tables_num from $database.cluster_info where ts > $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, vgroup_id, max(tables_num) as tables_num from $database.vgroups_info where ts > $from and ts <= $to partition by vgroup_id interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(tbs_total) as tbs_total from $database.cluster_info
select last(uptime) as uptime from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn'
select last(has_mnode) as has_mnode from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select last(cpu_cores) as cpu_cores from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' interval ($interval)
select last(vnodes_num) as vnodes_num from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(masters) as masters from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select last(cpu_engine) from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select last(mem_engine) as taosd, last(mem_total) as total from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select last(disk_used) as used, last(disk_total) as total, last(disk_used) / last(disk_total) as percent from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to
select _wstart as ts, last(cpu_engine) as taosd, last(cpu_system) as system from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep='$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, last(mem_engine) as taosd, last(mem_system) as system, last(mem_total) as total from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep='$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, last(used) as level0_used, last(total) as level0_total from $database.data_dir where level = 0 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(used) as level1_used, avg(total) as level1_total from $database.data_dir where level = 1 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(used) as level2_used, avg(total) as level2_total from $database.data_dir where level = 2 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(used)/avg(total) as level0_percent from $database.data_dir where level = 0 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(used)/avg(total) as level1_percent from $database.data_dir where level = 1 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select avg(used)/avg(total) as level2_percent from $database.data_dir where level = 2 and dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)

select _wstart as ts, last(io_read_disk) as io_read_taosd, last(io_write_disk) as io_write_taosd from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, 0 - avg(net_in) as net_in, avg(net_out) as net_out from $database.dnodes_info where dnode_ep = '$fqdn' and ts >= $from and ts <= $to interval($interval) fill(null)
select sum(gauge) from (select last(gauge) as gauge from $database.taosadapter_restful_http_request_total group by client_ip, endpoint, request_method, request_uri, status_code)
select sum(gauge) from (select last(gauge) as gauge from $database.taosadapter_restful_http_request_fail group by client_ip, endpoint, request_method, request_uri, status_code)
select last(gauge) as cpu_percent from $database.taosadapter_system_cpu_percent where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(gauge) as mem_percent from $database.taosadapter_system_mem_percent where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select _wstart as ts, avg(gauge) as request_in_flight, endpoint from $database.taosadapter_restful_http_request_in_flight where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by endpoint interval($interval)

select ts, status_code, gauge from (select _wstart as ts, status_code, last(gauge) as last_gauge, first(gauge) as first_gauge, last(gauge)-first(gauge) as gauge from $database.taosadapter_restful_http_request_total where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to partition by status_code interval($interval) fill(null))

list.definition: select name from information_schema.ins_databases where `vgroups` is not null
list.label: Log from
list.name: database
list.query: select name from information_schema.ins_databases where `vgroups` is not null
